item.title: A foot-thumping foray into modern jazz
item.author: Joshua Lawrence,,
item.description: GoGo Penguin are a Mercury Prize nominated jazz trio who are lumped into the increasingly broad genre of modern jazz; a genre best separated from its predecessors by an unashamed acceptance of rhythm. Man Made Object is a testament to this. The album’s blend of classical jazz and modern house music …
